name: Jelly Blocks
description: A unique, simple, relaxing and fun puzzle/match-3 game built using soft body physics.
minimum_requirements: OS: Modern-ish like 7+ Processor: Just about anything Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Eh, anything Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Do people still install these?
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 I guess? Processor: Whatever you've got Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Can it mine blockchain? Then it's way more than this game needs Storage: 50 MB available space
